data.name: The Wanderer: Frankenstein’s Creature - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Wanderer: Frankenstein’s Creature - Original Soundtrack

Original soundtrack of The Wanderer: Frankenstein's Creature, a narrative adventure game by La Belle Games and ARTE based on Mary Shelley’s classic novel.

The album includes the critically-acclaimed and award-nominated score from the game and a bonus 10 additional minutes of music to take you on a dark romantic journey through the beautiful and haunting story of Frankenstein’s creature.

The game is available now on Steam:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/966670/The_Wanderer_Frankensteins_Creature

Composed and performed by Alex Burnett (@ABurnettMusic)

The Wanderer: Frankenstein’s Creature is a co-production of La Belle Games and ARTE Experience

data.short_description: Original soundtrack of The Wanderer: Frankenstein's Creature, a narrative adventure game by La Belle Games and ARTE based on Mary Shelley’s classic novel.
data.reviews:
“Even separate from the game, Burnett offers the listener the opportunity to philosophize ~ to write, play or imagine an ending for the creature and for one’s self.”
A Closer Listen

“The music is incredible (if Gris met Octopath Traveler)”
Hey Poor Player

“The musical score – employing a variety of instruments from strings, to piano, to woodwinds and even voices – soars triumphantly in crescendo to lift the heart.”
Adventure Gamers
